Generate all 5 standard plots for a given data subset

generate_plot_suite.Rd

Generate all 5 standard plots for a given data subset

Usage

generate_plot_suite(
  ci_data,
  q_data,
  facet_formula,
  filename_suffix,
  subtitle = "",
  save_fn,
  x_breaks = NULL,
  linetype_var = NULL,
  use_aggregate = FALSE,
  width = 14,
  height = 12,
  point_size = 1.5
)

Arguments

ci_data

CI summary data (filtered)

q_data

Q bias data (filtered)

facet_formula

Facet formula

filename_suffix

Suffix for filenames

subtitle

Plot subtitle

save_fn

Function to save plots (takes plot and filename)

x_breaks

X-axis breaks

linetype_var

Optional linetype variable for aggregate plots

use_aggregate

Use aggregate theme

width

Plot width

height

Plot height

point_size

Point size

Value

NULL (saves plots as side effect)

On this page
